name: test_ssh_connection
description:
arrange: given a related machine charm and a tmate-ssh-server charm.
    act: when ssh connection is requested.
    assert: the connection is made successfully.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given a related machine charm and a tmate-ssh-server charm.
act: when ssh connection is requested.
assert: the connection is made successfully.
